title: About us | Numeral
description: We built Numeral to be the end-to-end platform for sales tax compliance. Let us take care of sales tax.
seoDescription: We built Numeral to be the end-to-end platform for sales tax compliance. Let us take care of sales tax.

data.html:
About Numeral

Sales tax on autopilot for e-commerce and SaaS.

Last updated:

January 1, 2025
data.text: About NumeralSales tax on autopilot for e-commerce and SaaS.Last updated:January 1, 2025

hero.title: About Numeral
hero.description: Sales tax on autopilot for e-commerce and SaaS.

data.html:
Sales tax is complex and challenging

It all changed in 2018.

In 2018, the Supreme Court ruled that businesses are responsible for collecting sales tax on out-of-state sales.

A small e-commerce brand doing $5M in sales typically owes sales tax in 30+ states. And a growing SaaS company might now be dealing with nexus in 23 jurisdictions. But registering a business in multiple states with their own tax codes is daunting.

And we had to do something about it.

We built Numeral to be the end-to-end platform for sales tax compliance. As former operators ourselves, we felt the pain of sales tax compliance firsthand. So we fixed it.

Today, we work with some of the fastest growing e-commerce brands and SaaS companies. Let us take care of sales tax.

But registering a business in multiple states with their own tax codes is daunting.And we had to do something about it.We built Numeral to be the end-to-end platform for sales tax compliance. As former operators ourselves, we felt the pain of sales tax compliance firsthand. So we fixed it.Today, we work with some of the fastest growing e-commerce brands and SaaS companies. Let us take care of sales tax.

data.html:
Leadership

We are tax experts, operators, and engineers

Co-Founder

Sam Ross

Prior to Numeral, Sam started numerous e-commerce businesses that have generated over $50M in revenue. However, the headache of filing sales taxes across many states became the basis for starting Numeral.

Co-Founder

Matt DuVall

Matt is a software engineer with 12+ years of experience and is a YC founder. He has spent time honing his craft at and led teams at Stripe, Notion, and Box.
‍

data.html:
Sales tax is complex and challenging

It all changed in 2018.

In 2018, the Supreme Court ruled that businesses are responsible for collecting sales tax on out-of-state sales.

A small e-commerce brand doing $5M in sales typically owes sales tax in 30+ states. And a growing SaaS company might now be dealing with nexus in 23 jurisdictions. But registering a business in multiple states with their own tax codes is daunting.

And we had to do something about it.

We built Numeral to be the end-to-end platform for sales tax compliance. As former operators ourselves, we felt the pain of sales tax compliance firsthand. So we fixed it.

Today, we work with some of the fastest growing e-commerce brands and SaaS companies. Let us take care of sales tax.

But registering a business in multiple states with their own tax codes is daunting.And we had to do something about it.We built Numeral to be the end-to-end platform for sales tax compliance. As former operators ourselves, we felt the pain of sales tax compliance firsthand. So we fixed it.Today, we work with some of the fastest growing e-commerce brands and SaaS companies. Let us take care of sales tax.

data.html:
Leadership

We are tax experts, operators, and engineers

Co-Founder

Sam Ross

Prior to Numeral, Sam started numerous e-commerce businesses that have generated over $50M in revenue. However, the headache of filing sales taxes across many states became the basis for starting Numeral.

Co-Founder

Matt DuVall

Matt is a software engineer with 12+ years of experience and is a YC founder. He has spent time honing his craft at and led teams at Stripe, Notion, and Box.
‍

.v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: 1px solid var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-warm-500);

  background:  var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  display: flex;
  height: 2.875rem;
  padding: .1875rem;
  position: relative;
}

.v3_footer .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: none;
  background: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field {

}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field .input {

}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field > label {
  display: none;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
  background: transparent;
  border: none;

  font-size: 1rem;

  line-height: 140%;
  padding: 0 1rem;

}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input::selection {
  background: black;
}

.v3_footer-cta .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input:focus-visible {
  outline: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msgs {
  position: absolute;
  background: #ff3100cf;
  top: 3rem;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
  width: max-content;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  list-style: none;
  border-radius: 0.5rem;
  margin: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  grid-row-gap: 0.25rem;
  box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msg {
  background: transparent;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 0.825rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 0;
  border: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs_error_rollup {
  position: absolute;
  top: 150%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-700);
  height: 100%;
  border-radius: .5rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  box-shadow: 0px 1px 3px 0px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10), 0px 1px 2px -1px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10);
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit:hover {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-800);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit:active {
  box-shadow: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit .actions {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit input {
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
  white-space: nowrap;
  width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
  padding: 0 1rem;
  cursor: pointer;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill,
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:hover, 
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:focus, 
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:active {
  transition: background-color 5000s;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: var(--white) !important;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs_error_rollup {
  display: none !important;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

	.v3_email-collect-form-embed {

 .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {

<script>
  hbspt.forms.create({
    portalId: "39949294",
    formId: "7c6aefad-be41-466e-9cdb-38a4d3786439",
		onFormReady: function () {
      // Remove asterisk from placeholder:
      $('input[name="email"]').attr("placeholder", "Enter your work email");

			// April 1st changes:
			const pageSlug = document.querySelector('html').getAttribute('data-wf-item-slug');
      if(pageSlug == 'global') {
      	document.cookie = "enteringPage=global; path=/";
      }
    }
  });
</script>
